  • メソッド
com.worksap.nlp.sudachi

インタフェース InputText<E>


  • public interface InputText<E>
    An immutable sequence of characters. This class has the original input text and the modified text each character of which is mapped to the original one. In the methods of this class the index is not one of characters or code points. The meaning of the index is implementation dependent, but users do not have to worry about it.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド abstractメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      boolean canBow(int index)
      Returns whether the character can be a head of a word or not.
      int codePointCount(int begin, int end)
      Returns the number of Unicode code points in the text range.
      int getCharCategoryContinuousLength(int index)
      Returns the longest length of the substring all the character of which share the same character category types.
      java.util.Set<CategoryType> getCharCategoryTypes(int index)
      Returns the set of category types of the character at the specified index in the modified text.
      java.util.Set<CategoryType> getCharCategoryTypes(int begin, int end)
      Returns the intersection of the sets of category types of each characters in the specified substring.
      int getCodePointsOffsetLength(int index, int codePointOffset)
      Returns the length of offset from the given index by codePointOffset code points.
      int getOriginalIndex(int index)
      Returns the index of the original text mapped to the character at the specified index in the modified text.
      java.lang.String getOriginalText()
      Returns the original input text before all of the replacements in InputTextBuilder.replace(int, int, java.lang.String).
      java.lang.String getSubstring(int begin, int end)
      Returns the substring of the modified text.
      java.lang.String getText()
      Returns the modified text.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getText

        java.lang.String getText()
        Returns the modified text. This text is used in the tokenizing.
        戻り値:
        the modified text

      • getOriginalText

        java.lang.String getOriginalText()
        Returns the original input text before all of the replacements in InputTextBuilder.replace(int, int, java.lang.String).
        戻り値:
        the original input text.

      • getSubstring

        java.lang.String getSubstring(int begin,
                              int end)
        Returns the substring of the modified text. The substring begins at the specified begin and extends to the character at index end - 1.
        パラメータ:
        begin - the beginning index
        end - the ending index
        戻り値:
        the new string
        例外:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if begin or end are negative, greater than the length of the sequence, or begin is greater than end

      • getOriginalIndex

        int getOriginalIndex(int index)
        Returns the index of the original text mapped to the character at the specified index in the modified text.
        パラメータ:
        index - the index of the modified text
        戻り値:
        the index of original text
        例外:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index are negative, greater than the length of the sequence

      • getCharCategoryTypes

        java.util.Set<CategoryType> getCharCategoryTypes(int index)
        Returns the set of category types of the character at the specified index in the modified text.
        パラメータ:
        index - the index of the modified text
        戻り値:
        the set of the character category types
        例外:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index are negative, greater than the length of the sequence

      • getCharCategoryTypes

        java.util.Set<CategoryType> getCharCategoryTypes(int begin,
                                                 int end)
        Returns the intersection of the sets of category types of each characters in the specified substring. The substring begins at the specified begin and extends to the character at index end - 1.
        パラメータ:
        begin - the beginning index
        end - the ending index
        戻り値:
        the set of the character category types
        例外:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if begin or end are negative, greater than the length of the sequence, or begin is greater than end

      • getCharCategoryContinuousLength

        int getCharCategoryContinuousLength(int index)
        Returns the longest length of the substring all the character of which share the same character category types. The substring begins at the specified index.
        パラメータ:
        index - the beginning index
        戻り値:
        the length of the substring has the same character category types
        例外:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index are negative, greater than the length of the sequence

      • getCodePointsOffsetLength

        int getCodePointsOffsetLength(int index,
                              int codePointOffset)
        Returns the length of offset from the given index by codePointOffset code points. Unpaired surrogates within the text range given by index and codePointOffset count as one code point each.
        パラメータ:
        index - the index to be offset
        codePointOffset - the offset in code points
        戻り値:
        the length of offset
        例外:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is negative or larger then the length of this sequence, or if codePointOffset is positive and the subsequence starting with index has fewer than codePointOffset code points, or if codePointOffset is negative and the subsequence before index has fewer than the absolute value of codePointOffset code points.

      • codePointCount

        int codePointCount(int begin,
                   int end)
        Returns the number of Unicode code points in the text range. The text range begins at the specified begin and extends to the character at index endIndex - 1.
        パラメータ:
        begin - the index to the first character of the text range
        end - the index after the last character of the text range
        戻り値:
        the number of Unicode code points in the specified text range

      • canBow

        boolean canBow(int index)
        Returns whether the character can be a head of a word or not.
        パラメータ:
        index - the index of the character
        戻り値:
        true if, and only if character can begin a word
